solution_line_template: Ellen ate {breakfast_calories} calories for breakfast + {lunch_calories} for lunch + {snack_calories} for a snack = <<{breakfast_calories}+{lunch_calories}+{snack_calories}={total_calories_eaten}>>{total_calories_eaten} calories.
Ellen has {daily_calorie_limit} calories - {total_calories_eaten} = <<{daily_calorie_limit}-{total_calories_eaten}={calories_left_for_dinner}>>{calories_left_for_dinner} calories left for dinner.
